definition[0]: the image of a dead person or strange thing that someone thinks they see
definition[1]: something that exists only in your imagination
definition[3]: not real, but seeming real to the person affected
note[0]: phantom fat (=fat that someone believes they still have after they have lost weight)
definition[4]: made to seem real in order to deceive people
example[2]: Phantom contracts were used to make the company seem more successful than it was.
definition[5]: used humorously to describe an unknown person that you blame for something annoying
example[3]: The phantom pen stealer strikes again!
